title: LeagueClient caused ACCESS_VIOLATION in module LeagueClient
body:
I don't know why, but for the past two days every time I try and launch the client (both legacy and the new one), I get a bugsplat ever time.

> LeagueClient caused ACCESS_VIOLATION in module LeagueClient
> 
> Write to location 00000000 caused an access violation.
> 
> User Information:
>     User Name:
>     Computer Name:
> 
> System Information:
>     4 processor(s), type 586.
>     37% of memory in use.
>     7785M total physical memory.
>     4848M free physical memory.
>     9001M total paging file.
>     5787M free paging file.
>     4095M total virtual memory.
>     3987M free virtual memory.
> 
> Process Memory:
>     3987M free.
>       33M reserved.
>       75M commited.
>     Largest free block is 2035M.
> 
>     PageFaultCount: 23490
>     PeakWorkingSetSize: 10M
>     WorkingSetSize: 10M
>     QuotaPeakPagedPoolUsage: 0M
>     QuotaPagedPoolUsage: 0M
>     QuotaPeakNonPagedPoolUsage: 0M
>     QuotaNonPagedPoolUsage: 0M
>     PagefileUsage: 2M
>     PeakPagefileUsage: 6M

replies.body: It sounds like your pc is trying access your game files but something is blocking that from happening.  Based on your info this could be due to a permissions problem or even hardware.  Start out with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to rule out possibilities.  Let me know how that works out for you!
Unfortunately, none of those options worked. ;o

Damn, that sucks to hear but thanks for trying.  In this case download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and grab some logs for us.  Attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will continue working with your specific issue.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
I have the same issue. Any fix yet?
Im having this issue now too. BUMP
2months after I have the same problem
